meanings.definition: The act of creating a consistent visual or aesthetic style for a particular event or space.
meanings.sent1: The theming of the party with colorful decorations made it look festive.
meanings.sent2: She excels in theming events with unique and creative designs.
meanings.sent3: The theming of the office with a jungle theme was unexpected but fun.
meanings.sent4: The theming of the restaurant as a spaceship took diners on a galactic journey.
meanings.sent5: The theming of the garden with fairy lights created a magical atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The process of designing and implementing a theme for a website or application.
meanings.sent1: His expertise in theming websites has led to user-friendly interfaces.
meanings.sent2: They are currently working on theming the new app with a minimalist design.
meanings.sent3: The theming of the online store with a pirate theme added a playful touch.
meanings.sent4: The theming of the software as a futuristic cityscape was innovative.
meanings.sent5: Her attention to detail in theming apps ensures a seamless user experience.
